string.text: Help! If anyone can hear me! The military got us pinned at the factory!
The pigs have got me cornered in the yard. Help!
Get the hell outta here, Marked One. You won't get past those army bastards without a fight. I told the Barkeep about you. He'll strike a deal with Duty, and they'll let you through.
Strelok, I have sad news. Fang died. Couldn't meet you. Too bad you went to the center on your own. It was your choice though. I know where to search for you, and whom to ask. Ghost.
